properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Immaculate Mary,
your praises we sing,
who reignest with Christ,
our redeemer and King.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ave, ave, ave, Maria.
Ave, ave, ave, Maria.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In Heaven the blessed,
your glory proclaim,
on earth we your children,
invoke your family name.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We pray you, O mother,
may God's will be done,
we pray for his glory,
may his Kingdom come.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We pray for our Mother,
the Church upon earth;
and bless, holy Mary
the land of our birth.
